quotes.text: The most important step a man can take. It's not the first one, is it? It's the next one.
quotes.author: Dalinar Kholin

quotes.text: The purpose of a storyteller is not to tell you how to think, but to give you questions to think upon.
quotes.author: Wit (Hoid)

quotes.text: The destination is important, but so is the journey. And what you learn along the way.
quotes.author: Kaladin Stormblessed

quotes.text: Words are where most change begins.
quotes.author: Navani Kholin
The First Ideal of the Knights Radiant

quotes.text: Life breaks us, Teft. Then we fill the cracks with something stronger.
quotes.author: Rock

quotes.text: The pain is what shapes us, after all.
quotes.author: Moash

quotes.text: The most important step a man can take. It's not the first one, is it? It's the next one.
quotes.author: Dalinar Kholin

quotes.text: The stars are beautiful, because of a flower that cannot be seen.
quotes.author: Szeth-son-son-Vallano

quotes.text: The only thing that changes is how we perceive it.
quotes.author: Lopen

quotes.text: Expectation is the mother of disappointment.
quotes.author: Wit (Hoid)

quotes.text: I will protect those who cannot protect themselves.
quotes.author: The Second Ideal of the Windrunners
